name: The Pits of Hope
description:
Press left and right to jump between ladders.  Recover your self confidence after life events make you feel small, and in the pits...

WebGL is experimental, but hey, this kinda works on mobile even!

Team Flatiron Penguin Games

Thornton Munson: Art, Sound Effects (with his mouth), and Level Design

Tyler Damon: Programming and Project Planning

Sean Farrell: Team Mentor

Music: No More Magic by HorrorPen

 https://opengameart.org/content/no-more-magic

Font: InkNut Antiqua
